org.jacorb.orb
Class CDROutputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.OutputStream
      org.omg.CORBA.portable.OutputStream
          org.omg.CORBA_2_3.portable.OutputStream
              org.jacorb.orb.CDROutputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Flushable, CodeSet.OutputBuffer, ValueOutputStream
Direct Known Subclasses:
MessageOutputStream
public class CDROutputStream
extends OutputStream
implements CodeSet.OutputBuffer, ValueOutputStream

Author:
Gerald Brose A stream for CDR marshalling.

Constructor Detail

CDROutputStream

public CDROutputStream(ORB orb,
                       int bufferSize)
size selecting c'tor

Parameters:
orb - must be a JacORB ORB
bufferSize - -1 to fetch the default buffer size, value > 0 to specify a specific size

CDROutputStream

public CDROutputStream(ORB orb)
OutputStreams created using this constructor are used also for in memory marshaling, but do use the ORB's output buffer manager

CDROutputStream

public CDROutputStream()
OutputStreams created using the empty constructor are used for in memory marshaling. A stream created with this c'tor is not explicitly configured, i.e. it will use default configuration only

                  int start,

           throws IOException
write the contents of this CDR stream to the output stream called by, e.g. GIOPConnection to write directly to the wire.

check

public final void check(int i,
                        int align)
This version of check does both array length checking and data type alignment. It is a convenience method.

beginEncapsulation

public final void beginEncapsulation()
Start a CDR encapsulation. All subsequent writes will place data in the encapsulation until endEncapsulation is called. This will write the size of the encapsulation.

beginEncapsulatedArray

public final void beginEncapsulatedArray()
Can be used locally for data type conversions without preceeding call to beginEncapsulation, i.e. without a leading long that indicates the size.

endEncapsulation

public final void endEncapsulation()
Terminate the encapsulation by writing its length to its beginning.

releaseBuffer

public byte[] releaseBuffer()
Give up the buffer to the caller and mark the stream closed. It is up to the caller to eventually return the buffer to the manager.

write_char

public final void write_char(char c)
write_char writes a character to the output stream. If codeset translation is active then it will use String and an encoding to get the bytes. It can then do a test for whether to throw DATA_CONVERSION.

Specified by:
write_char in class OutputStream
Parameters:
c - a char value

                                   int offset,
                                   int length)
Specified by:
write_char_array in class OutputStream

write_string

public final void write_string(String value)
write_string writes a string to the output stream. It is optimised for whether it is writing a blank string or for whether codeset translation is active.

Specified by:
write_string in class OutputStream
Parameters:
value - a String value

write_value

public final void write_value(TypeCode typeCode,
                              InputStream input)
Reads a value of the type indicated by tc from the InputStream in and remarshals it to this CDROutputStream. Called from Any.

write_abstract_interface

public void write_abstract_interface(Object object)
Writes an abstract interface to this stream. The abstract interface is written as a union with a boolean discriminator, which is true if the union contains a CORBA object reference, or false if the union contains a value.

Overrides:
write_abstract_interface in class OutputStream

start_value

public void start_value(String rep_id)
start_value implements ValueOutputStream JavaToIDL mapping 02-01-12. It should end any currently open chunk, write a valuetype header for a nested custom valuetype (with a null codebase and the specified repository ID), and increment the valuetype nesting depth.

Specified by:
start_value in interface ValueOutputStream
Parameters:
rep_id -

end_value

public void end_value()
end_value implements ValueOutputStream JavaToIDL mapping 02-01-12. It should end any currently open chunk, write the end tag for the nested custom valuetype, and decrement the valuetype nesting depth.

Specified by:
end_value in interface ValueOutputStream

getMaximumStreamFormatVersion

public byte getMaximumStreamFormatVersion()

updateMutatorConnection

public void updateMutatorConnection(GIOPConnection connection)
updateMutatorConnection is an accessor that updates the ior mutator. By making callers pass in a GIOPConnection not a transport this allows callers to not have to call getTransport which would require a synchronized lock. Therefore if the mutator has not been enabled this is effectively a NOP.

Parameters:
connection - an org.omg.ETF.Connection value

public int get_pos()
